name: arena-cards
description: Turn an are.na channel into draggable cards for spatial thinking

readme.html:
Draggable Arena Cards

This code was originally created as part of a YouTube video exploring the are.na API and taking control of your own data

This uses Nuxt + the are.na API to allow the user to authorize the application, and then see a list of channels. Within a channel, blocks can be dragged anywhere on the page, and they will stay where you left them (because we store the location in local storage)
readme.raw: # Draggable Arena Cards This code was originally created as part of a [YouTube video exploring the are.na API and taking control of your own data](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ly3BXZbWOak) This uses Nuxt + the are.na API to allow the user to authorize the application, and then see a list of channels. Within a channel, blocks can be dragged anywhere on the page, and they will stay where you left them (because we store the location in local storage)
